Title: View all products with full details and inventory status
Description: Verify admin can retrieve a complete list of all products, including all details and current inventory status.
AcceptanceCriteria: All products are returned with fields: id, name, description, price, category, stockQuantity
Inventory status (stockQuantity) is present and accurate

Title: View all products – no products exist
Description: Verify the API returns an empty list when no products exist in the catalog.
AcceptanceCriteria: API returns 200 OK with an empty array

Title: View all products – security enforcement
Description: Verify that non-admin users cannot access the endpoint to retrieve all products with sensitive details.
AcceptanceCriteria: API returns 401 Unauthorized or 403 Forbidden for unauthorized user

Title: Add a new product with valid details
Description: Verify admin can add a new product by providing all required fields.
AcceptanceCriteria: API returns 201 Created with the new product's details
Product is retrievable via GET /api/products

Title: Add a new product – missing required fields
Description: Verify API returns validation errors when required fields (name, price, category) are missing.
AcceptanceCriteria: API returns 400 Bad Request with error details

Title: Add a new product – negative price value
Description: Verify API does not allow creation of a product with negative price.
AcceptanceCriteria: API returns 400 Bad Request with error message

Title: Add a new product – very large description
Description: Verify API handles maximum allowed description length for a product.
AcceptanceCriteria: API returns 201 Created if within allowed limit
API returns 400 Bad Request if limit exceeded

Title: Update product details – valid update
Description: Verify admin can update details of an existing product (name, description, price, category, images).
AcceptanceCriteria: API returns 200 OK and updated product details
Changes are reflected in subsequent GET requests

Title: Update product details – non-existent product
Description: Verify API returns appropriate error when updating a non-existent product.
AcceptanceCriteria: API returns 404 Not Found

Title: Update product details – invalid data
Description: Verify API returns validation errors when updating with invalid data (e.g., negative price, missing name).
AcceptanceCriteria: API returns 400 Bad Request with error details

Title: Update product details – security enforcement
Description: Verify only admin users can update product details.
AcceptanceCriteria: API returns 401 Unauthorized or 403 Forbidden for unauthorized user

Title: Remove product (delete) – valid product
Description: Verify admin can remove a product (hard delete or mark as inactive).
AcceptanceCriteria: API returns 200 OK or 204 No Content
Product no longer appears in GET /api/products

Title: Remove product – non-existent product
Description: Verify API returns appropriate error when deleting a non-existent product.
AcceptanceCriteria: API returns 404 Not Found

Title: Remove product – security enforcement
Description: Verify only admin users can remove a product.
AcceptanceCriteria: API returns 401 Unauthorized or 403 Forbidden for unauthorized user

Title: Update inventory levels – valid update
Description: Verify admin can update the inventory (stockQuantity) for a product.
AcceptanceCriteria: API returns 200 OK and updated stockQuantity
New inventory value is reflected in GET requests

Title: Update inventory levels – negative stock
Description: Verify API does not allow setting negative inventory values.
AcceptanceCriteria: API returns 400 Bad Request with error

Title: Update inventory levels – very large stock value
Description: Verify API handles maximum allowed stockQuantity value.
AcceptanceCriteria: API returns 200 OK if within allowed limit
API returns 400 Bad Request if limit exceeded

Title: Update inventory levels – security enforcement
Description: Verify only admin users can update inventory levels.
AcceptanceCriteria: API returns 401 Unauthorized or 403 Forbidden for unauthorized user

Title: Search products by category
Description: Verify admin can search for products by category.
AcceptanceCriteria: API returns 200 OK with products in specified category

Title: Performance – view all products with large dataset
Description: Verify the API response time when retrieving a large number of products does not exceed acceptable thresholds.
AcceptanceCriteria: API response time is under defined SLA (e.g., <2s for 10,000 products)
